text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @CNN @OANN @newsmax Spanky, stfu, will you? You have made America a laughingstock around the World. Additionally, due to your inability to do your job, over 130,000 Americans have died from #coronavirus so far and will keep rising because you can't face reality. You're pathetic! #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath https://t.co/F66Oqazfy6
